mapper.select: SELECT AVG(star) avgstar,g.goods_id,g.goods_img,g.goods_name,g.goods_status,g.description,g.inventory,g.price,g.sales,g.type_id FROM goods g LEFT JOIN comments c ON g.goods_id = c.goods_id GROUP BY g.goods_id ORDER BY g.type_id

SELECT AVG(star) avgstar,g.goods_id,g.goods_img,g.goods_name,g.goods_status,g.description,g.inventory,g.price,g.sales,g.type_id FROM goods g LEFT JOIN comments c ON g.goods_id = c.goods_id WHERE g.type_id = (SELECT d.type_id FROM goods d WHERE d.goods_id = #{goods_id}) AND g.goods_id!= #{goods_id} GROUP BY g.goods_id ORDER BY sales DESC
